tool_description: Keyword Tool helps to analyze keywords and related keywords competitions, search volume, and CPC. Mostly useful for digital marketers and related platforms
name: Keyword Tool_v2
title: Keyword Tool

api_list.name: /langlist
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-tool.p.rapidapi.com/langlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-tool.p.rapidapi.com/langlist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
